sentences: Henrik Schwarz (born May 31, 1972) is a deep house and classical (crossover) producer and DJ from Bodensee, Germany.
His career began in the early 1990s.
In 2017, he worked with songwriter/producer Jarrah McCleary (or Panama).
Since 2002, Henrik Schwarz has had over 100 music releases and productions as an artist for labels such as Warner Music, Universal Music, Motown, Sony/BMG, !
K7, Verve Records, as well as independent labels such as Defected Records, Innervisions, Ninja Tune, G-Stone, Compost Records and many more.
Schwarz’s early years culminated in 2006 with a mix for DJ-Kicks CD series.
Henrik Schwarz Live (CD, Ltd, Promo) (Sunday Music Records, 2005)
Henrik Schwarz & Metropole Orkest – Scripted Orkestra (7k!, 2018)
